## Connections to Gaussian processes.


## Labels

GP = Gaussian process
Exp =  exponential covariance structure
SqExp = squared exponential covariance structure
Matern = Matern covariances structure
OU = Ornstein-Uhlenbeck
$\mathcal{l}$ = horizontal length-scale
$\mathcal{\nu}$ = controls differentiability

## References

Rasmussen & Williams (2006). Gaussian Processes for Machine Learning.
Murphy (2012). Machine Learning: A probabilistic perspective.
